title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: Next Block Expo Summit 2023 | 24-25 May, 2023 | Warsaw, PolandEvent Website: https://nextblockexpo.com/Meet founders, investors & web3 community on 24-25 May in Warsaw at a content rich event! Hear stories from our speakers: builders, investors & experts that are moving the web3 industry. Chat with people, scan badges to save contacts, use match-making tool that connects you to the right profiles & book meetings. Meet investors for 1:1 speed-dating meetings in a comfortable networking zone. Get noticed by contest partners: VC’s, Accelerators, Incubators & Launchpads. Latest event, Next Block Expo, took place in November 2022 in Berlin. Past event in numbers:- 2038 participants - 157 speakers - 36 exhibitors - 322 investors - 140 startups - 113 NBX Women ambassadors - 64 countries - 1206 meetings made in the networking area - 1846 chats in the app

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: Next Block Expo – The Warsaw Summit 2023:https://bitcoingarden.org/next-block-expo-the-warsaw-summit-2023/The second edition of the Next Block Expo event with a few thousand attendees will be held at the Multikino Złote Tarasy Warsaw venue on 24 and 25 of May, linking the most influential people and projects in the web3 space. With presentations and keynotes at the main stage, roundtables and workshops, NBX is an excellent opportunity for startups and already established blockchain companies to discuss current challenges and new opportunities.Event brings together industry leaders and experts to discuss the latest developments and trends in the fields of: DeFi, Metaverse, NFT, Gaming, Privacy, Scaling, Exchanges, Venture Capital, Fundraising, Legal/ Tax, Payments, and Security....

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: NBX Warsaw Summit – Shaping the Future of Web3 Space https://bitcoingarden.org/nbx-warsaw-summit-shaping-the-future-of-web3-space/Next Block Expo will be held on May 24th and 25th at the Multikino Zlote Tarasy in Warsaw. The event brings together the most influential individuals, brands, and projects in the web3 space, offering a unique opportunity to discuss current challenges, trends, and future opportunities.NBX Warsaw Summit interest is very high, with the last tickets left. Organizers anticipate reaching a maximum number of attendees.With the maximum venue capacity, NBX has partnered with Unbound to allow participants to join the event online in the Metaverse. It is an extension of the live event that offers many additional surprises....
